name: Death Mates
description:
Sabotage your friends!

Death Mates is a local multiplayer party game where two players participate in a deadly footrace. 

There are 3 lanes, each of which are scattered with crates that contain power-ups or traps that you can place directly onto the level! Trap your friend and use the power-ups to boost yourself and get to the finish line in a series of 5 rounds. Everything you place stays there until the end of the game, so watch out for previously placed traps!

CONTROLS (2 CONTROLLERS REQUIRED):

Jump: A

Switch Lanes: D-Pad up/down

Place Trap/Power-up: Right bumper

Have fun!
